title: List of all Android job  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android job  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-job
repoList.description: Android library to handle jobs in the background.

repoList.name: AsyncJobLibrary
repoList.description: Android library to easily queue background and UI tasks

repoList.name: jobmanager
repoList.description: Android library for executing tasks.

repoList.name: Chronos
repoList.description: Android library that handles asynchronous jobs.

repoList.name: JobSchedulerCompat
repoList.description: Android library to schedule background jobs using JobScheduler, GCMNetworkManager or AlarmManager, depending on the context.

repoList.name: job-sample
repoList.description: A sample application of the library https://github.com/evernote/android-job

repoList.name: AndroidJobDemo
repoList.description: Demo Application to test Android-Job library by Evernote.

repoList.name: Iris
repoList.description: Convenient wrapper library to perform network queries using Retrofit and Android Priority Job Queue (Job Manager)

repoList.name: TaskManager
repoList.description: A simple、 light（only two file)、fast 、powerful 、easy to use 、easy to extend 、 Android Library To Manager your AsyncTask/Thread/CallBack Jobqueue !   一个超级简单，易用，轻量级，快速的异步任务管理器，类似于AsyncTask，但是比AsyncTask更好用，更易控制，从此不再写Thread ！ ^_^

repoList.name: react-native-android-job
repoList.description: React-Native library to handle jobs in the background which is based on android-job.
